story.book.dataclient

Class BinaryFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • story.book.dataclient.BinaryFile

  • public class BinaryFile
extends java.lang.Object
    BinaryFile contains the file information for a BinaryIllustration. It is used to save BinaryIllustrations to the server.
    Author:
    Vina Nguyen, Anthony Ou

        Decode the given base64 string into the file associated with the BinaryIllustration

        bs - is the base64 string
